snippet.title: Squirrel Sphere - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
Released in 2018, Squirrel Sphere is a follow-up to Sean Davy's 2D precision platformer Squirreltopia. This time around, this game is taking heavy inspiration from SEGA's Super Monkey Ball series, as you control a squirrel inside a ball.

Shadowtail returns and has trapped your squirrel friends inside spheres and took them away in a UFO. It's once again up to you to rescue those critters and thwart Shadowtail's nefarious scheme.

Squirrel Sphere (C) Sean Davy

#steam #steamgame #steamgames #steamindies #steamindiegames #steamindie #indiegames #indiegame #squirrels #squirrel #squirreltopia #squirrelsphere #theforeseenarcade

FUN FACT: Stage 2-7 is guaranteed to drive you nuts (and not in a good way). Seriously.
